member.name: T:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.SetterValueBindingHelper
member.summary: Class that implements a workaround for a Silverlight XAML parser limitation that prevents the following syntax from working: <Setter Property="IsSelected" Value="{Binding IsSelected}"/>.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.SetterValueBindingHelper._values
member.summary: Backing store for the Values property.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.SetterValueBindingHelper.GetPropertyBinding(System.Windows.FrameworkElement)
member.summary: Gets the value of the PropertyBinding attached DependencyProperty.
member.param: Element for which to get the property.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.SetterValueBindingHelper.SetPropertyBinding(System.Windows.FrameworkElement,System.Windows.Controls.Theming.SetterValueBindingHelper)
member.summary: Sets the value of the PropertyBinding attached DependencyProperty.
member.param: Element on which to set the property.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.SetterValueBindingHelper.PropertyBindingProperty
member.summary: PropertyBinding attached DependencyProperty.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.SetterValueBindingHelper.OnPropertyBindingPropertyChanged(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Change handler for the PropertyBinding attached DependencyProperty.
member.param: Object on which the property was changed.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.SetterValueBindingHelper.ApplyBinding(System.Windows.FrameworkElement,System.Windows.Controls.Theming.SetterValueBindingHelper)
member.summary: Applies the Binding represented by the SetterValueBindingHelper.
member.param: Element to apply the Binding to.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.SetterValueBindingHelper.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional type parameter used to specify the type of an attached DependencyProperty as an assembly-qualified name, full name, or short name.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.SetterValueBindingHelper.Property
member.summary: Gets or sets a property name for the normal/attached DependencyProperty on which to set the Binding.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.SetterValueBindingHelper.Binding
member.summary: Gets or sets a Binding to set on the specified property.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.SetterValueBindingHelper.Values
member.summary: Gets a Collection of SetterValueBindingHelper instances to apply to the target element.
member.remarks: Used when multiple Bindings need to be applied to the same element.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.SetterValueBindingHelper.AssembliesToSearch
member.summary: Gets a stream of assemblies to search for the provided type name.

member.summary: Implicitly applies the System Colors theme to all of its descendent FrameworkElements.

member.summary: Stores a reference to a Uri referring to the theme resource for the class.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this theme is the application theme.
